function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in crowded occupational environments","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and outbreak of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety measures, reducing workforce density, and promoting remote work where possible","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, thermal scanners, and air filtration systems","People":"Workers in crowded occupational environments","Owner":"Employers and government authorities"},{"Description":"Occupational exposure to coronavirus based on job tasks","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for workers in different exposure levels","Mitigation":"Providing appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), implementing strict hygiene protocols, and conducting regular testing","Technologies":"PPE, sanitization stations, and testing kits","People":"Workers in various industries","Owner":"Employers and occupational safety organizations"}]}
